Header: More Community Projects Done in Kilinochchi
Content: Troops of 11 (V) Gajaba Regiment (GR) under command to the 651 Brigade under the 65 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi extended their assistance to clean the Mulankavil Pullayar Kovil premises and Kariyalanagapadduwan Anthoniyar Church premises during 28 - 31 August. Meanwhile, the troops of 20 (V) Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) of the 652 Brigade organized a Shramadana to clean the Skandapuram Pullayar Kovil on 31 August. A total of 32 troops including two officers together with 16 civilians participated in the said Shramadana movement. Those community projects were organized on the directions of the Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya and under the supervision of the General Officer Commanding, 65 Division, Major General Wasantha Kumarapperuma.
